DOC.brief_summary: This study examines possible risk factors with regard to complications following pacemaker or implantable defibrillator cardioverter (ICD) implantation.
DOC.brief_title: Complications Following Pacemaker or Implantable Defibrillator Cardioverter (ICD) Implantation in Denmark
DOC.detailed_description: This study examines possible risk factors with regard to complications following pacemaker or implantable defibrillator cardioverter (ICD)implantation. Furthermore validation af the Danish Pacemaker and ICD Register will be conducted.
DOC.criteria: patients receiving a cardiac device (pacemaker, cardiac resynchronization therapy (CRT) or implantable defibrillator cardioverter (ICD)), or undergoing a reoperation
